name: Xiao Chen 0001
content: Xiao Chen's Home Page Computer Science Home Research Publication Teaching Service Xiao Chen Associate Professor Department of Computer Science Texas State University 601 University Blvd San Marcos, TX, USA, 78666 Email: xc10 @ txstate . edu Phone: (512)-245-3873 (office) Office:  CMAL 311A I'm currently an associate professor of computer science at Texas State University. I have been a visiting researcher at UT Austin and research associate at U.S. Naval Postgraduate School. My research interests include various topics in delay tolerant networks, sensor networks, and ad hoc wireless networks. I served as an associate editor, program committee member, session chair, and reviewer of numerous international journals and conferences. Xiao Chen, Computer Science Department, Texas State University, San Marcos, TX 78666
